record.properties: Top = 220 Left = 1 Width = 765 Height = 493 DataSource = .NULL. Name = "Dataenvironment"
Top = 20 Left = 10 Height = 293 Width = 90 Alias = "mr_modids" Order = "modid" Database = ..\data\data1.dbc CursorSource = "mr_modids" Name = "Cursor1"
Top = 20 Left = 150 Height = 293 Width = 90 Alias = "mr_modids1" Database = ..\data\data1.dbc CursorSource = "mr_modids" Name = "Cursor2"
Top = 20 Left = 290 Height = 376 Width = 90 Alias = "mr_mods" Database = ..\data\data1.dbc CursorSource = "mr_mods" Name = "Cursor3"
Top = 20 Left = 430 Height = 412 Width = 148 Alias = "mr_addons" Database = ..\data\data1.dbc CursorSource = "mr_addons" Name = "Cursor4"
DoCreate = .T. Caption = "MODIDS" uniqueid = A20520F4060F4D6BA82879FF4484FE76 Name = "MR_MODIDS" tmrSql.Name = "tmrSql"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Activate DoDefault()
Thisform.gridmain.Refresh() ENDPROC PROCEDURE Destroy *!* destroy
_inisetvalue('MR_MODIDS_MODID', mr_modids.modid) ENDPROC PROCEDURE init2 *!* init2
If Seek(_inigetvalue('MR_MODIDS_MODID', mr_modids.modid), 'MR_MODIDS', 'MODID') = .F.
Go Top In 'MR_MODIDS'
Endif ENDPROC

record.properties: Height = 456 Left = 12 Top = 36 Width = 936 _gridcontextmenulang = en Name = "gridmain"
Top = 0 Left = 168 Height = 28 Width = 48 Picture = ..\res\1x\outline_search_black_18dp.png Caption = "GOOGLE" ToolTipText = "" Name = "tbvermin"
Top = 0 Left = 216 Height = 28 Width = 108 Picture = ..\res\1x\outline_file_copy_black_18dp.png Caption = "PASTE URL" ToolTipText = "" Name = "_tbcommand1"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click If Not Empty(_Cliptext)
Replace mr_modids.url With _Cliptext In 'mr_modids'
Endif
Thisform.Refresh() ENDPROC

record.properties: Top = 0 Left = 828 Height = 28 Width = 96 Picture = ..\res\1x\outline_open_in_new_black_18dp.png Caption = "OPEN" ToolTipText = "OPEN PROJECT URL IN WEB BROWSER" ZOrderSet = 4 tbalign = 2 tbmarginv = 4 Name = "tboverview"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click If Not Empty(mr_modids.url)
mr_shellexecute(mr_modids.url)
Endif
ENDPROC

record.properties: Top = 0 Left = 12 Height = 28 Width = 72 Picture = ..\res\1x\outline_autorenew_black_18dp.png Caption = "SCAN" ToolTipText = "SCAN MODS FOLDER" ZOrderSet = 4 Name = "tbscan"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click _logwrite('PROCESS START')
select 'mr_mods'
scan for not empty(mr_mods.modid)
if seek(mr_mods.modid, 'mr_modids1', 'modid') = .f.
append blank in 'mr_modids1'
replace mr_modids1.modid with mr_mods.modid in 'mr_modids1'
if 'CLIENT' $ upper(mr_mods.env)
replace mr_modids1.isclient with .t. in 'mr_modids1'
endif
endif
replace mr_modids1.filename with mr_mods.filename1 in 'mr_modids1'
if seek(mr_mods.aid, 'mr_addons', 'aid') and not empty(mr_addons.slug)
replace mr_modids1.url with mr_geturlproject(mr_addons.slug) in 'mr_modids1'
endif
endscan
_logwrite('PROCESS END')
thisform.updateui()
thisform.refresh()
ENDPROC

record.properties: Top = 0 Left = 360 Height = 28 Width = 108 Picture = ..\res\1x\outline_toggle_on_black_18dp.png Caption = "TOGGLE CLIENT" ToolTipText = "" Name = "_tbcommand2"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click REPLACE mr_modids.isclient WITH NOT mr_modids.isclient In 'mr_modids'
Thisform.Refresh() ENDPROC

record.properties: Top = 0 Left = 924 Height = 28 Width = 28 FontSize = 8 Picture = ..\res\3bars.png Caption = "" TabIndex = 7 ToolTipText = "MENU" ZOrderSet = 21 tbalign = 2 tbautowidth = .F. tbpictureautosize = .F. tbmenuoffseth = 6 tbautofontsize = .F. tbmarginv = 4 Name = "tbmenu"
